# tg_node_state (Resource)

Manage a Node state.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "tg_node_state" "enable_mynode" {
  node_id = "mynode-uuid"
  enabled = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `enabled` (Boolean) Enable the node
- `node_id` (String) Node UID

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
